personal.name: Muhammad Kamal
personal.title: Senior Backend Engineer | Python • Django • Scalable Systems
personal.bio: Senior Backend Engineer with 4+ years of experience building and scaling backend systems in production. Specialized in Python, Django/DRF, PostgreSQL, AWS, and event-driven architectures. Strong experience in system design, performance optimization, zero-downtime migrations, and CI/CD. Proven ability to own backend services end-to-end in data-intensive, production-critical environments.

responsibilities: Owned multiple backend services in production, including deployments, monitoring, incident resolution, and mentoring junior engineers
Designed and evolved REST APIs and internal services using Python and Django/DRF supporting thousands of daily active users
Reduced critical API latency by 40% by redesigning PostgreSQL indexes, query plans, and Redis caching strategy
Executed zero-downtime PostgreSQL migrations involving millions of rows while maintaining data integrity
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Git, Docker, and AWS, reducing deployment failures by ~30%
Implemented observability using Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, and CloudWatch to detect and resolve production issues early
Independently handled production incidents, bug fixes, and performance issues in a remote contract setup
Designed and deployed backend APIs using Python, Flask, and MySQL for production systems
Improved slow-performing endpoints by 80–90% through query optimization and backend refactoring
Added automated tests and service documentation to improve long-term maintainability
Built and integrated backend APIs for payment gateway systems interacting with financial institutions
Contributed to high-availability payment services handling sensitive financial transactions in a regulated environment
Collaborated with frontend and DevOps teams to deliver production releases using Docker and PostgreSQL
Developed backend systems using Django REST Framework and PostgreSQL for complex business workflows
Implemented real-time features using Django Channels and Kafka
Designed APIs, database schemas, and containerized deployments using Docker
Worked on search functionality using Elasticsearch for large datasets
Designed event-driven workflows using Kafka and RabbitMQ, making architectural trade-offs between synchronous APIs and async pipelines based on consistency, latency, and failure modes
Developed backend services using Django and Django REST Framework
Designed relational database schemas and optimized SQL queries
Applied OOP principles to build maintainable backend codebases

projects.name: Synctoon
projects.description: Production-ready open-source AI-powered 2D animation tool that converts text scripts and audio into complete animated videos with automated lip-sync, expressions, and frame-based rendering.
highlights: Automatically generates animations using AI with lip sync and dynamic character expressions
Aligns perfectly with audio timing and produces smooth frame-by-frame animations
Built to make animation accessible to storytellers, educators, YouTubers, and hobbyists
Featured on YouTube with demo videos showcasing the animation capabilities

projects.name: ToonFrame Architect
projects.description: AI-Powered Animation Storyboard Generator that transforms written stories and scripts into detailed animation storyboards using Google's Gemini AI.
highlights: Script-to-storyboard conversion with dual start/end frames per scene
Consistency Bible for character & environment tracking across scenes
Supports multiple image resolutions: 1K, 2K, 4K for professional workflows
Export storyboards as PDF or ZIP with modern 2D cartoon style optimization

projects.name: Inkwell Apprentice
projects.description: AI-Powered Drawing Practice Tool designed to help users practice and improve their inkpen drawing skills with structured exercises and PDF practice sheets.
highlights: Generates drawing practice sheets in PDF format with structured learning progression
AI-powered assistance for creating visual prompts and drawing exercises
Supports beginner to advanced skill levels with automated practice material creation
Lightweight, fast interface with placeholder image generation for handling failures

projects.name: 2D Mouth Lipsyncing Tool Website
projects.description: Innovative web-based tool that automates the process of creating 2D mouth lipsync animations using only audio files and text scripts.
highlights: Generates high-quality mouth lipsync animation with green background for easy compositing
User-friendly interface accessible for both experienced and novice animators
Automated animation generation saves time while maintaining professional quality
Green screen output allows easy integration into other video projects

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, fully responsive React portfolio website with dynamic JSON data loading and professional PDF CV generation capabilities.
highlights: Dark theme with glassmorphism effects and smooth animations
PDF CV generation client-side with professional formatting
Dynamic content management via single JSON file for easy updates
Component-based architecture with beautiful UI animations and gradient accents

projects.name: PostgreSQL Data Migrator
projects.description: Robust Python suite designed to efficiently transfer tables and data between PostgreSQL databases with advanced constraint handling.
highlights: Schema reflection with automatic table creation and constraint handling
Bulk data migration with configurable chunks for optimal performance
Deferred constraint handling for complex schemas and table exclusions
Comprehensive logging and monitoring with secure environment variable support

projects.name: PostgreSQL Streaming Physical Replication
projects.description: Docker-based setup demonstrating PostgreSQL Streaming Physical Replication for high availability and disaster recovery.
highlights: Primary-Replica architecture with real-time WAL streaming and Hot Standby mode
Fully containerized setup with auto-configuration of replication slots
Supports monitoring of replication lag and failover testing scenarios
Near real-time replication with crash-consistent, byte-for-byte data integrity

projects.name: Local-to-Internet Tunnel
projects.description: Lightweight shell-script-based tool that instantly exposes local backends to the internet using Cloudflare tunnels with auto-detection.
highlights: Auto-detection of local backends (Django, React/Node, Flask, Java, etc.)
Instant public URL generation with comprehensive process management
Free alternative to ngrok with background process management and auto-recovery
Simplifies webhook testing, API sharing, and live demos without deployment

projects.name: Ubuntu Dev Setup
projects.description: Automated shell script that streamlines Ubuntu development environment setup by installing essential development tools with a single command.
highlights: One-command setup installing Git, VS Code, Postman, Teams, pgAdmin, Docker
Ensures consistent development environment across team members
Eliminates repetitive manual installations and configuration errors
Speeds up onboarding process for new developers significantly

education.details: Focus on software engineering, backend systems, and databases
